:::{.def}

Flax does not implement methods to load datasets since [PyTorch](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch), [TensorFlow](https://github.com/tensorflow/datasets), and [Hugging Face](https://github.com/huggingface/datasets) already provide great APIs for this.

:::

## Padding

### Why?

Prevent recompilation for the last batch that is smaller (different shape).
